Change Log
==========

1.3.4
-----
- Added alternate warning/instructions for missing python3-smbus
- Code quality improvements

1.2.3
-----
- Print fix

1.2.2
-----
- Added i2c_bus_id detection for older Pi

1.2.1
-----
- Removed hard dependancy upon SMbus, added message at runtime

1.0dev
-------
- Initial release
